open url.description: Open a custom URL in browser

open file.description: Open a file with its default application

focus chat.code:
pyautogui.hotkey('alt', 'tab')
time.sleep(0.5)
import pyautogui
screen_width, screen_height = pyautogui.size()
pyautogui.click(screen_width // 2, screen_height - 100)
time.sleep(0.2)
focus chat.description: Switch to previous window and click input field

focus chatgpt.code:
import ctypes
user32 = ctypes.windll.user32
def focus_window(title):
    def callback(hwnd, _):
        if user32.IsWindowVisible(hwnd):
            length = user32.GetWindowTextLengthW(hwnd)
            if length > 0:
                buff = ctypes.create_unicode_buffer(length + 1)
                user32.GetWindowTextW(hwnd, buff, length + 1)
                if title.lower() in buff.value.lower():
                    user32.SetForegroundWindow(hwnd)
                    return False
        return True
    WNDENUMPROC = ctypes.WINFUNCTYPE(ctypes.c_bool, ctypes.c_void_p, ctypes.c_void_p)
    user32.EnumWindows(WNDENUMPROC(callback), 0)
focus_window('ChatGPT')
time.sleep(0.5)
screen_width, screen_height = pyautogui.size()
pyautogui.click(screen_width // 2, screen_height - 100)
focus chatgpt.description: Focus ChatGPT window and click input field

focus claude.code:
import ctypes
user32 = ctypes.windll.user32
def focus_window(title):
    def callback(hwnd, _):
        if user32.IsWindowVisible(hwnd):
            length = user32.GetWindowTextLengthW(hwnd)
            if length > 0:
                buff = ctypes.create_unicode_buffer(length + 1)
                user32.GetWindowTextW(hwnd, buff, length + 1)
                if title.lower() in buff.value.lower():
                    user32.SetForegroundWindow(hwnd)
                    return False
        return True
    WNDENUMPROC = ctypes.WINFUNCTYPE(ctypes.c_bool, ctypes.c_void_p, ctypes.c_void_p)
    user32.EnumWindows(WNDENUMPROC(callback), 0)
focus_window('Claude')
time.sleep(0.5)
screen_width, screen_height = pyautogui.size()
pyautogui.click(screen_width // 2, screen_height - 100)
focus claude.description: Focus Claude window and click input field

search tab.code:
pyautogui.hotkey('ctrl', 'shift', 'a')
time.sleep(0.5)
pyautogui.write('__VAR__', interval=0.02)
time.sleep(0.3)
pyautogui.press('enter')
time.sleep(0.5)
screen_width, screen_height = pyautogui.size()
pyautogui.click(screen_width // 2, screen_height - 100)
search tab.description: Search for tab by name using Chrome tab search (Ctrl+Shift+A)

jama is alive.description: Display message that JAMA is alive

snap left.description: Snap window to left half of screen

snap right.description: Snap window to right half of screen

move to start of line.description: Move cursor to start of line

move to end of line.description: Move cursor to end of line

move to start of document.description: Move cursor to start of document

move to end of document.description: Move cursor to end of document

open terminal here.description: Open Windows Terminal in current directory

toggle comment.description: Toggle line comment in code editor

duplicate line.description: Duplicate current line in code editor

move line up.description: Move line up in code editor

move line down.description: Move line down in code editor

command palette.description: Open command palette in VS Code

quick open.description: Quick open file in VS Code

right click.description: Perform right click at current position

double click.description: Perform double click at current position

triple click.description: Perform triple click to select paragraph/line

delete file.description: Delete selected file to recycle bin

new folder.description: Create new folder in File Explorer

parent folder.description: Go to parent folder in File Explorer

open drive.description: Open Google Drive in default browser

center mouse.description: Move mouse to center of screen

show ip address.description: Show system IP address and network info

show battery status.code: subprocess.Popen('cmd /k WMIC Path Win32_Battery Get EstimatedChargeRemaining', shell=True)

turn off monitor.code: subprocess.Popen('powershell (Add-Type -MemberDefinition "[DllImport(""user32.dll"")] public static extern int SendMessage(int hWnd, int hMsg, int wParam, int lParam);" -Name "Win32SendMessage" -Namespace Win32Functions -PassThru)::SendMessage(0xffff, 0x0112, 0xF170, 2)', shell=True)

get wifi password.code: subprocess.Popen('cmd /k netsh wlan show profile name="__VAR__" key=clear', shell=True)
get wifi password.description: Get WiFi password for a network (VAR=SSID)

wait for text.description: Wait until specific text appears on screen

set timer.description: Set a Google timer for specified duration (e.g. '5 minutes')

snap window left.description: Snap current window to the left

snap window right.description: Snap current window to the right

focus window.description: Switch focus to a window matching the title

set anchor.code:
import pyautogui, ctypes
ANCHOR_POS = pyautogui.position()
ANCHOR_HWND = ctypes.windll.user32.GetForegroundWindow()
print(f'Anchor set at {ANCHOR_POS} (Window: {ANCHOR_HWND})')
pyautogui.press('enter')
set anchor.description: Save current mouse position and active window as anchor

focus anchor.description: Focus anchored window and click anchored position

notepad notedown.description: Write commands to Notepad and execute them sequentially (Batch Mode)
